name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
description: Apple Flagship Mobile Phone

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra comes with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and 108MP quad-camera setup. Available in Phantom Black, White, and Green.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life, touch sensor controls, and voice assistant compatibility. Available in Black and Silver.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.4-inch FHD+ display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Ideal for professionals and students.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: Apple's MacBook Pro with M1 Pro chip, 16-inch Retina display, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Perfect for creative professionals.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 is a 2-in-1 device with a 13-inch touchscreen, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Includes Surface Pen.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Headphones
description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 wireless headphones offer superior noise cancellation, up to 24 hours of battery life, and comfortable ear cushions. Available in Black and White.

name: Google Pixel 7 Pro
description: Google Pixel 7 Pro features a 6.7-inch OLED display, Google Tensor chip, 12GB RAM, and a 50MP triple-camera system. Available in Stormy Black, Cloudy White, and Hazel.

name: Apple iPad Pro 11-inch
description: Apple's iPad Pro 11-inch with M2 chip, Liquid Retina display, and 128GB storage. Supports Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Sony PlayStation 5 with 825GB SSD, ray tracing, and 4K gaming support. Includes DualSense wireless controller.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: Nintendo Switch OLED model with 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and 64GB internal storage. Includes Joy-Con controllers.

name: HP Envy 15 Laptop
description: HP Envy 15 laptop with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti graphics. Ideal for content creation.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: Apple Watch Series 8 with 45mm case, always-on Retina display, ECG app, and blood oxygen sensor. Available in multiple colors.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 with 44mm AMOLED display, GPS, and advanced health tracking features. Compatible with Android and iOS.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
description: GoPro HERO11 Black with 5.3K60 video, HyperSmooth 4.0 stabilization, and waterproof design. Perfect for action sports enthusiasts.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mirrorless Camera
description: Canon EOS R6 full-frame mirrorless camera with 20.1MP sensor, 4K60 video, and Dual Pixel CMOS AF II. Ideal for professional photographers.

name: Sony A7 IV Mirrorless Camera
description: Sony A7 IV mirrorless camera with 33MP full-frame sensor, 4K60 video, and 5-axis in-body stabilization. Suitable for both photography and videography.

name: DJI Mavic 3 Drone
description: DJI Mavic 3 drone with 4/3 CMOS Hasselblad camera, 46-minute flight time, and advanced obstacle avoidance. Ideal for aerial photography.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
description: Logitech MX Master 3S wireless mouse with ergonomic design, advanced scroll wheel, and customizable buttons. Perfect for productivity.

name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Keyboard
description: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX Speed switches, customizable RGB lighting, and macro keys.

name: Alienware Aurora R13 Gaming PC
description: Alienware Aurora R13 gaming PC with Intel Core i9 processor, NVIDIA RTX 3080 graphics, 32GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Built for extreme gaming.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Apple AirPods Pro with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and spatial audio. Includes MagSafe charging case.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
description: Amazon Echo Dot smart speaker with Alexa, improved sound quality, and voice control. Available in Charcoal, Glacier White, and Twilight Blue.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: Fitbit Charge 5 fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitor, and sleep tracking. Available in Black, Lunar White, and Steel Blue.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1
description: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 electric pressure cooker with 6-quart capacity, 14 one-touch programs, and stainless steel cooking pot.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
description: Dyson V15 Detect cordless vacuum with laser dust detection, up to 60 minutes of runtime, and advanced filtration. Includes multiple cleaning attachments.

name: Keurig K-Supreme Plus Coffee Maker
description: Keurig K-Supreme Plus single-serve coffee maker with multi-stream technology, adjustable brew strength, and 78-ounce water reservoir.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8
description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 with 11-inch LTPS TFT display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, and S Pen included. Ideal for work and entertainment.

name: Roku Streaming Stick 4K
description: Roku Streaming Stick 4K with HDR10+ support, voice remote with TV controls, and access to thousands of streaming channels.

name: LG OLED C2 Series 55-inch TV
description: LG OLED C2 Series 55-inch 4K Smart TV with AI ThinQ, Dolby Vision IQ, and NVIDIA G-SYNC. Delivers stunning picture quality and immersive sound.
